member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Guard.Clauses.GuardAgainst.Null``1(``0)
member.summary: This method will check whether the specified object is null or not.
member.typeparam: Specifies the generic object to check for null.
member.param: The object to check for null.
member.returns: The original object if it is not null.
member.exception: Thrown when the object is, in fact, null.
